narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Shanon Tadaravicius is a Registered Nurse provider based in Milwaukee, WI. From 2018-09 through 2019-05, this provider received $166K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 804 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 4.9× the national median for H0003 (H0003), at $65 per claim vs. the median of $13. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
100% of billing is concentrated in H0003 (H0003), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-05, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
